Solve the bug in our new voting protocol—can you forge a valid signature under RSA low exponent? Here’s the signature you intercepted: 0x58b863fe3ab313d728523954d527de7cf7df05290e1af69b6bca4d550ab76aff6a6740ef0a6da0a3e43fabe887b5516fb9cdbfcb956339d7bda548b74ba6b95f

## Challenge Technical Details
